ItemDesc: Upon use, increases all allies' chance to resist Burn by <unbreak>100%</unbreak> for 4 turns for the next battle. When this bonus expires, all allies lose <unbreak>30</unbreak> Energy.
ItemBGDesc: This soda made of fermented white grapes tastes both sour and bitter. It serves as an exceptionally revitalizing remedy for summer heat, and consuming it often results in sneezing and a runny nose. According to those who have tasted it, it feels like a cold hand pressed against the back of your neck.\n\n"Pika Pika... Ah-choo...!"
